Signatures and seals are critical. I compare them against known samples, checking for subtle differences in pressure, slant, and flow. Watermarks and holograms are another area of focus. I use both naked eye and magnifying glass to inspect their clarity and consistency. Authentic watermarks are visible under UV light, while forgeries often glow too brightly or not at all.
